title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 277.2 - Initiation by commissioner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 277.2 - Initiation by commissioner

State Regulations

Such proceeding may be instituted by the commissioner by the
service of an order to show cause. Thereafter, the procedure as outlined in

Parts 275 and 276 of this Chapter shall be followed so far as
applicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
277.2

Amended

New

York State Register January 24, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 4, eff. 1/24/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
